Package org.ogema.driver.homematic.config

Class DeviceConfigs

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ogema.driver.homematic.config.DeviceConfigs
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AllConfigs, PowerMeterConfig, ThermostatConfig, THSensorConfig, WaterDetectorConfig
    public abstract class DeviceConfigs
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the super class for all device specific configuration classes. It holds the raw data of all supported registers in all lists. They are initialized at the first full configuration reading and updated after each change trough a configuration write operation.
